text: The water level in Mettur Dam stood at 82.66 feet on Saturday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level of the dam was 44.660 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 134 cusecs. About 15,000 cusecs of water was being discharged from the dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region. Another 400 cusecs was being let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system in Salem, Namakkal and Erode districts, the PWD sources said.
title: Water level in Mettur Dam
